int gcd ( int a, int b ){int c;while(a!= 0){c=a;a=b%a;b=c;}return b;}
LL powmod(LL a,int b,int n){LL rm=1;while (b){if (b % 2) { rm = (rm * a) % n; }a = (a * a) % n;b /= 2;}return rm;}

void sint(int &x)
{
	register int c = gc();
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

void sll(LL &x)
{
	register LL c = gc();
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

int seg[4 * MAX], a[MAX];

void insert(int n,int it,int f){
	if ( it == f){
		seg[n] = a[f];
		return ;
	}
	int m = (it +f)/2;
	insert((2*n), it , m);
	insert((2*n) + 1, m+1,f);
	seg[n] = seg[n*2] + seg[n*2 + 1];
}

void update(int n,int it,int f,int q1,int q2){
	if ( seg[n] == 0) return ;
	if ( it==f){
		seg[n] /=2;
		return ;
	}
	int m = (it +f)/2;
	if ( q2 <= m) update(n * 2, it , m, q1 , q2);
	else if ( q1>m) update(n*2+1,m+1,f,q1,q2);
	else{
		update(n*2,it,m,q1,m);
		update(n*2+1,m+1,f,m+1,q2);
	}
	seg[n] = seg[n*2] + seg[n*2+1];
}

int query(int n,int it,int f,int q1,int q2){
	if ( it == q1 && f==q2) return seg[n];
	int m = (it+f)/2;

	if ( q2 <= m) return query(n*2,it,m,q1,q2);
	else if ( q1>m) return query(n*2+1,m+1,f,q1,q2);
	else{
		int lf =query(n*2,it,m,q1,m) ;
		int rg = query( n*2+1, m+1,f,m+1,q2);
		return lf + rg;
	}
}

int main()
{
	int n, Q ,l, r, type;
	cin>>n;
	FOR(i,1,n) sint(a[i]);
	cin >> Q;
	insert(1,1,n);
	for(int i=1;i<=Q;++i){
//		scanf("%d%d%d",&type,&l,&r);
		sint(type);
		sint(l);
		sint(r);
		if ( type == 1){
			update(1,1,n,l,r);
		}
		else{
			printf("%d\n", query(1,1,n,l,r));
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
